channel.title: Register to play
channel.description:
im not verry good at html or xhtml for that matter so i was wondering if some 1 could help me with this problem...
ok i want to make it so you have to go to my website>create an acc>FORM
and the form i want to put there is a page where you register to make an account but i dony know how to make it server side or website side i really need somewhere to start will someone please help me?
[size=28pt] ALSO MOPAR NEEDS TO MAKE A GENERAL DISCUSSION PAGE [/size]

item.title: Register to play

item.description:

Use google. Also, no we don’t need a discussion board. Just go on MITB.
